game.name: The Wondrous Wedding of Ivan the Bard
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A romantic fairy tale set in a fantasy medieval Rus'. Play as Ivan, a young bard with a gusli in hand, on a quest to win the love of the elusive Novgorod princess. Learn tunes, make choices!
